name: Dr. David Pai

studentHours.note: Email to schedule Zoom or in-person meeting

encouragementMessage: Don't hesitate to reach out! Office hours are YOUR time. Whether you're stuck on a lab, confused about pointers, or just want to discuss programming, I'm here to help. Students who use office hours consistently perform better in the course.
bio: Dr. Pai has been teaching computer science at Mendocino College since 2015. He specializes in programming education and believes in hands-on, project-based learning. His teaching philosophy centers on building confidence through incremental challenges and supportive feedback.
preferredContact: Canvas messages for course-related questions; email for personal/confidential matters
responseTime: 24-48 hours on weekdays; 72 hours on weekends
